Admissions                        Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                                                   Take Action                     Request Information    Attend an Information Session    Submit a Pre-Application    Apply Now    Contact Us                                Admissions    Applying to Stern  Experienced professionals interested in making a lifelong investment in their intellectual development and career should apply now for enrollment in Stern’s Executive MBA Program.     Attend an Information Session  If you are in the beginning stages of exploring Executive MBA programs, we recommend attending one of our Executive MBA Information Sessions . These are held throughout the academic year, either on campus or at a convenient mid-town location. At the Information Session, you will learn what distinguishes Stern’s Executive MBA program from others and how it will prepare you for lifelong professional success. You will also meet other prospective students who could become part of your future network.     Visit a Class  There is no better way to see what the NYU Stern Executive MBA experience is really like than by attending some of our classes. Applicants who have completed both the pre-application and the admissions interview are encouraged to request a Class Visit . During the day of your Class Visit, you will observe two classes and meet several of our current students, so you can experience the classroom dynamics firsthand.                                         Did You Know…?      After you’ve submitted a Pre-Application and interviewed, you can attend a class and meet current students.    We hold information sessions on a monthly basis. Sign up now to learn more .
